item.title: PyCharm Pro for Free
item.description:
Hi,

Here is a very short short short post to explain how to get the PyCharm Pro edition and feel like at home. And ... this is completely legal

I suppose you use PyCharm Community edition to write your code in Python / Django, but now it is not enough for you …
item.dc:creator: foxmask
